actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to expedite the impeachment inquiry by the House Judiciary Committee.

summary.text: Directs the House Judiciary Committee to expedite its investigation into whether sufficient grounds exist for the House of Representatives to impeach President Richard M. Nixon. Authorizes the Committee to sit at least each Monday through Friday until such investigation is concluded. States that each member of the committee shall be excused from being present within the Hall of the House during its sittings and from voting on each question put while attending any meeting of the committee called for consideration of such investigation. Directs the committee to present to the House of Representatives a report on the results of its investigation no later than April 30, 1974.

titles.title: Resolution to expedite the impeachment inquiry by the House Judiciary Committee.
